Package twcore.core.util

Class Summary
ByteArray Internal storage class for holding an array of bytes, and performing various operations on it.
ConvertHex General utility class for byte to hex conversions.
InterProcessCommunicator Main class of the Inter-process Communication protocol of TWCore, handling routing of messages between bots along specific channels.
IPCMessage Used as a transmitter of messages between bots, using the IPC protocol.
MapRegions Very easy way to check if a player is in a certain part of the map.
MessageLimiter Optional class for limiting the number of messages that can be sent to a bot from a given player within 60 seconds.
SearchableStructure  
SearchableStructure.SearchData  
SimpleFileFilter Class that implements the java.io.FilenameFilter interface.
Spy Extremely similar to PubBot's spy module.
StringBag  
Tools
